models.emptyNoSearch: No models found, trying to fetch from server
models.emptyWithSearch: No models match the search criteria

models.title: Models

neutral.description: Select the neutral tone for the app
neutral.title: Neutral Color Settings

previewMessages.botHowToUse: You can adjust the primary and neutral colors using the color picker below. The preview will update in real time to show the effect.
previewMessages.userHowToUse: How to use the theme preview?

primary.description: Select the primary color for the app
primary.title: Primary Color Settings

expire.success: Access token has been expired immediately
expire.title: Access Token Expired

invalidate.success: Invalid access token has been written
invalidate.title: Invalid Access Token

expire.success: Refresh token has been expired immediately
expire.title: Refresh Token Expired

invalidate.success: Invalid refresh token has been written
invalidate.title: Invalid Refresh Token

mode.already: You are already in developer mode
mode.remaining: Tap {{count}} more times to enable developer mode
mode.title: Developer Mode

selfHostedEntry.confirmDescription: Enabling this will show the self-hosted setup entry on the login screen and sign you out. Continue to the login screen now?
selfHostedEntry.confirmResetDescription: Disabling self-hosted mode will restore the official server address and sign you out. Continue?
selfHostedEntry.description: Control whether the login screen shows the self-hosted instance button
selfHostedEntry.title: Show self-hosted login button

server.confirmDescription: Changing the server address will log out the current user and require re-login. Do you want to continue?
server.description: After configuration, all requests will use this server address. Leave blank to revert to the official server.
server.hint: Must start with http:// or https://. The app may require re-login.
server.invalid: Please enter a valid address starting with http:// or https://
server.notice: Custom servers will replace the default API endpoint. Please ensure the service is available and compatible with the LobeChat API protocol. Switching may require re-login or app restart.
server.resetSuccess: Official server address has been restored
server.title: Self-Hosted Instance
server.updated: Custom server address has been updated

fontSize.text: Note: This setting only affects the display size of the message content font.
fontSize.title: Font Size

openaiSettings.apiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter your OpenAI API Key
openaiSettings.checkApiKey: Please check if the API Key is correct
openaiSettings.checkProxyAddress: Cannot connect to server, please check if the proxy address is correct
openaiSettings.connectionSuccess: Connection successful, API Key and proxy address are configured correctly
openaiSettings.connectivityHint: After testing connectivity, the API Key and proxy address will be verified for correctness

config.aesGcm: Your keys and proxy address will be encrypted using the <1>AES-GCM</1> algorithm

checker.desc: Test if the API Key and proxy address are correctly entered
checker.title: Connectivity Check
